profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid derived from [original file format and conversion before encoding], [date here]. Machine-readable finding aid created by [Archivist Four].

change.item: Electronic finding aid revised according to local applications, by [Student Five].

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: [Records of [title here]] [date here, as per guidelines]
did.origination: [corpname, persname, or famname element here along with encoding analog attribute (100, 110), with name of creator, as per guidelines]

custodhist.head: Provenance
custodhist.p: [information about the chain of ownership of the materials being described, before reaching the archive]

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p:
There may be some restrictions on the use of the collection. For more information, contact
New York University Archives
Elmer Holmes Bobst Library
70 Washington Square South
New York, NY 10012

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p:
Published citations should take the following form:
Identification of item, date (if known); [unittitle here]; collection number; box number; folder number;
New York University Archives
Elmer Holmes Bobst Library
70 Washington Square South
New York, NY 10012 , New York University Libraries.

bioghist.head: [put Biographical or Historical here] Note
bioghist.p: [concise information about the creator(s) of the described materials]

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: [summary of range and topical coverage of the described materials, perhaps mentioning organization, e.g., series]

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: [information on how the described materials have been subdivided into smaller units, e.g., series]
[information on the filing sequence of the described materials, e.g., chronological]

controlaccess.name: [name element here, with name, as per guidelines]

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material at the New York University Archives
relatedmaterial.p: [information about materials not physically or logically with the described material, but that may be of use to a reader because of an association to the described materials]

separatedmaterial.head: Separated Material
separatedmaterial.p: [information about materials that are associated by provenance to the described materials but that have been physically separated or removed]
